text: He was accompanied by PM Ranil Wickremesinghe.PM Modi also unveiled the Gangaramaya Vesak Zone.Speaker Karu Jayasuriya, Ministers, MPs and other dignitaries participated on this occasion.PM Narendra Modi, who arrived in Sri Lanka this evening participated in religious observances at Seemamalakaya, Gangaramaya, Colombo. He was accompanied by PM Ranil Wickremesinghe.PM Modi also unveiled the Gangaramaya Vesak Zone.Speaker Karu Jayasuriya, Ministers, MPs and other dignitaries participated on this occasion.
title: PM Modi pays homage at Gangaramaya
